publisher seal: (Marks 299 -seal similar to 27-010)
medium: Woodblock print (aizuri-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Five Modern Beauties (Tōsei gonin bijo 當世五人美女)

text: This is an example of an aizuri-e, a print with just blue as color. In this case, there is also black which was, however, not used for the outlines as usual.
title: Beauty Holding a Pipe
